mapper.select:
SELECT T.GUID AS guid, T.SEEDFILEID AS seedfileid, T.MANUREDATE AS manuredate, T.MUCK AS muck, T.MUCKFACTORY AS muckfactory, T.CONTENT AS content, T.DOSAGE AS dosage, T.dosageunit as dosageunit, T.USETYPE AS usetype, T.BYPERSON AS byperson, T.PRINCIPAL AS principal, T.CREATEDATE AS createdate, T.OPERATORID AS operatorid FROM manure T
ORDER BY T.CREATEDATE desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manure ( GUID, SEEDFILEID, MANUREDATE, MUCK, MUCKFACTORY, CONTENT, DOSAGE, dosageunit, USETYPE, BYPERSON, PRINCIPAL, CREATEDATE, OPERATORID ) VALUES ( #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seedfileid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manuredate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{muck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{muckfactory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dosage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dosageunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{operatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM manure WHERE GUID IN
#{id}
